title: CTR Decline Detected
message: Q4 Developer Persona campaign CTR dropped 24% in the last 7 days. Possible creative fatigue detected.
recommendation: Consider refreshing ad creatives or adjusting targeting parameters.

title: Budget Threshold Reached
message: Mid-Market SaaS Leaders campaign has spent 94.7% of allocated budget with 12 days remaining.
recommendation: Pause campaign or increase budget allocation to maintain delivery.

title: High-Performing Audience Identified
message: Startup Founders campaign shows exceptional performance with 4.05% CTR. Consider scaling budget.
recommendation: Increase daily budget by 50% to capitalize on strong performance.

title: Audience Expansion Opportunity
message: Consider adding 'VP, Data Science' to Enterprise CTO campaign. Similar roles show 2x higher engagement.
recommendation: Add suggested job titles to targeting criteria.
